headline: Tracking William Nygren's Harris Associates Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Harris Associates' 13F portfolio decreased to $75.99B, focusing on 49 significant securities. Check out the notable new stakes in the portfolio.

headline: TOMS Capital pushes for Kenvue sale, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Investment firm TOMS CapitalInvestment Management has amassed a stake in the Band-Aid makerKenvue and is pushing the company to consider a fullsale or separation of some assets, Bloomberg News...
